description: A responsive personal portfolio website showcasing professional information, projects, and a means for visitors to get in touch.

hero_section.description: Prominent introduction area with name, tagline, and call-to-action button.
elements: Call-to-action button (e.g., View Projects / Contact Me)

about_me.description: Section describing the individual, skills, experience, and background.

projects_gallery.description: Showcase of projects with thumbnails, descriptions, and links.
elements: Project cards with image, title, short summary
Links to live demos or GitHub repositories

contact_form.description: Form for visitors to send inquiries or messages.

design.style: Clean, modern, and responsive design with consistent color palette and typography.
design.layout: Single-page scroll or multi-section layout with smooth navigation.
design.color_scheme: Light background with accent color for highlights (e.g., blue or teal).
design.accessibility: WCAG 2.1 AA compliant color contrast and keyboard navigation support.

backend: Node.js with Express (optional, for handling form submissions)
tools: EmailJS or serverless function for contact form

text.hero: Brief introduction highlighting who you are and what you do.
text.about: Detailed bio with education, experience, and key skills.
text.projects: List of completed works, each with a short description and links.
text.contact: Invitation to reach out along with contact form instructions.

images.project_thumbnails: Screenshots or mockups of each project.

metadata.title: Your Name - Portfolio
metadata.description: Showcase of projects, experience, and contact information.
